sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REMT3000 ( DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , REIP_DT , DDLNE_YN , DDLNE_DT , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT , DEGTR_NM , CORP_NM_FMNM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , CORP_NUM , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD , PENTR_CD , TX_DEPTY_NUM , HMTX_ID , TX_PGM_CD , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM , PERN_CHRG_NM , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #clutYrMnth# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #systemkey# , #reipDt# , #ddlneYn# , #ddlneDt# , #calcSevePayPsnSumtDt# , #degtrNm# , #corpNmFmnm# , #busoprRgstnNum# , #resnRegnNum# , #corpNum# , #incmRegrstDebrZpcd# , #incmRegrstDebrFndtnAddr# , #incmRegrstDebrDtlPatrAddr# , #juriTxOffcCd# , #pentrCd# , #txDeptyNum# , #hmtxId# , #txPgmCd# , #pernChrgDeptNm# , #pernChrgNm# , #pernChrgPhnNum# , #cllnDebrDivCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REMT3000 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , REIP_DT=#reipDt# , DDLNE_YN=#ddlneYn# , DDLNE_DT=#ddlneDt# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT=#calcSevePayPsnSumtDt# , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , CORP_NM_FMNM=#corpNmFmnm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM=#busoprRgstnNum# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , CORP_NUM=#corpNum# , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD=#incmRegrstDebrZpcd# , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR=#incmRegrstDebrFndtnAddr# , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#incmRegrstDebrDtlPatrAddr# , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD=#juriTxOffcCd# , PENTR_CD=#pentrCd# , TX_DEPTY_NUM=#txDeptyNum# , HMTX_ID=#hmtxId# , TX_PGM_CD=#txPgmCd# , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM=#pernChrgDeptNm# , PERN_CHRG_NM=#pernChrgNm# , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM=#pernChrgPhnNum# , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD=#cllnDebrDivCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REMT3000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , REIP_DT , DDLNE_YN , DDLNE_DT , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT , DEGTR_NM , CORP_NM_FMNM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , CORP_NUM , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD , PENTR_CD , TX_DEPTY_NUM , HMTX_ID , TX_PGM_CD , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM , PERN_CHRG_NM , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT3000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , REIP_DT , DDLNE_YN , DDLNE_DT , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT , DEGTR_NM , CORP_NM_FMNM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , CORP_NUM , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD , PENTR_CD , TX_DEPTY_NUM , HMTX_ID , TX_PGM_CD , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM , PERN_CHRG_NM , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_YR_MNTH LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , CLUT_YR_MNTH DESC , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM REMT3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_YR_MNTH LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
